description: A dashboard to visualise statistics about an InfluxDB Enterprise 1.x Cluster

panels.description: Instructions on applying an updated license can be located at https://docs.influxdata.com/enterprise_influxdb/v1.10/administration/renew-license/

targets.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
import "strings"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_entitlements")
    |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
    |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["host"] and exists r["licenseType"] and exists r["licenseExpiry"])
    |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "cluster_id", "host"])
    |> first(column: "url")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with expires: strings.replaceAll(v: r.licenseExpiry, t: "T00:00:00Z", u: "")}))
    |> keep(columns: ["expires", "host", "node"])
    |> group()

panels.title: License Expiry

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "influxdb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "n_shards")
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system" or r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> max()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
    _field: "RAM per node",
    _value: r._value }))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> max()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _field: "# CPU/node",
    _value: r._value
  }))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mode"] == "rw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["fstype"] != "tmpfs" and r["fstype"] != "devtmpfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] !~ /boot/)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
   _field: "Disk allocated",
   _value: r._value}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mode"] == "rw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["fstype"] != "tmpfs" and r["fstype"] != "devtmpfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] !~ /boot/)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
  _field: "Disk Used",
  _value: r._value }))

al = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mode"] == "rw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["fstype"] != "tmpfs" and r["fstype"] != "devtmpfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] !~ /boot/)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: 1,
   _field: "Disk allocated",
   _value: float(v: r._value) }))

used = from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mode"] == "rw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["fstype"] != "tmpfs" and r["fstype"] != "devtmpfs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] !~ /boot/)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
  _time: 1,
  _field: "Disk Used",
  _value: float(v: r._value) }))

join(tables: {t1: used, t2: al}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: (r._value_t1 / r._value_t2) * 100.0
  }))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_user")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host", "node"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load5")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

panels.description:
A per database and data-node measure of series cardinality.

Information on troubleshooting cardinality issues can be found at https://www.influxdata.com/blog/solving-runaway-series-cardinality-when-using-influxdb/

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_database")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "numSeries")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "database"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

panels.title: Series Cardinality

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_shards")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "instance"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

panels.description:
The size of the Hinted Handoff queue.

See https://docs.influxdata.com/enterprise_influxdb/v1.10/concepts/clustering/#hinted-handoff for more information on this queue and its meaning

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_hh_processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "queueBytes")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Hinted Handoff Queue Size

panels.description:
Average number of shard write errors per time period.

Depending on the consistency setting used, the cluster may report shard write errors when Hinted Handoff queues are not empty.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_shard")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "writePointsErr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["database"] == "_internal")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Shard Write Errors

panels.description:
Size of the Hinted Handoff queue per node, with destination node ID included.

The node ID can be matched to the output of "influxd-ctl show" in order to identify which node the data in the queue is (trying) to be sent to

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_hh_processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "queueBytes")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "node"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Hinted Handoff Per Destination Node ID

panels.description: The average rate at which each node is receiving points via API. This does not include internal replication

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_write")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pointReq")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "instance"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: Per Host Point Throughput

panels.description: The average rate at which points are being written into the cluster

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_write")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pointReq")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "instance"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum)

panels.title: Cluster Point Throughput

panels.description: Average query execution duration, by time

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_queryExecutor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "queryDurationNs")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: Query Durations

panels.description: Average number of queries per second

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_queryExecutor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "queriesExecuted")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "instance"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: Query Rate

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_httpd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "queryReq")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "instance"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(
        every: v.windowPeriod,
        fn: (tables=<-, column) => tables
            |> quantile(q: 0.99, method: "exact_selector"),
    )

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_httpd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "queryReq")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host","instance"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_cq")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "queryOk" or r["_field"] == "queryFail")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "instance"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "internal_write")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write_time_ns")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_httpd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "writeReq" )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "instance"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_httpd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "writeReq" or r["_field"] == "writeReqBytes")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with _value: r.writeReqBytes / r.writeReq  
  }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "host", "_value"])

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "influxdb_httpd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pointsWrittenOK" or r["_field"] == "pointsWrittenFail" or r["_field"] == "pointsWrittenDropped" or r["_field"] == "writeReq")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with _value: (r.pointsWrittenOK + r.pointsWrittenFail + r.pointsWrittenDropped)  / r.writeReq  
  }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "host", "_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mode"] == "rw")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "path"])
  

  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mode"] == "rw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "path"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reads" or r["_field"] == "writes")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "name"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "io_time")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: last)
  |> derivative(unit: 1ms, nonNegative: true)
  |> group(columns: ["time", "host"], mode:"by")

  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 100.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "writes")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "name"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reads")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "name"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] != "loop")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "name"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] != "loop")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "host", "name"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

title: InfluxDB Enterprise
